text: In his household, he cherished the moments when she would hum softly. Hers was a melody that lingered, and in those evenings, his heart would rest. Sometimes she spoke of histories—hers entwined with his—so that he felt there was no border between what she remembered and what he hoped for. He wished she understood how her silence carried weight, and how his words tried to bridge it. The history he carried differed from the history she guarded, yet the history they built together was evolving.
